Text:
Over 2700 downloads so far and no comments yet.  I realise that it's only been 3 days, but c'mon folks.

I just downloaded this.  It was very fast.  There's a lot of seeders (thanks!).

Run time is 1:49:38 with a resolution of 720 x 360.  File has chapter marks.

Video and audio quality is very, very good.

Haven't watched yet so I can't comment on the movie itself.

Enjoy.  Big thanks to the uploader!
